host

hardness 2.0

textureCaps strata:blocks/stone/strong/gneiss_caps
fragmentTexture strata:items/fragments/stone/mask erase 100 strata:items/fragments/stone/highlight screen 100 strata:items/fragments/stone/shadow multiply 100 strata:blocks/stone/strong/gneiss
blockState strata:proto_cube_y
lang.en Gneiss
